‚îÇ    const getPlanTimes = () => {                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const now = new Date();                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const today = new Date(now.getFullYear(), now.getMonth(), now.getDate(), 18, 0); // Today at 6 PM                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const tomorrow = new Date(now.getTime() + 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const weekend = new Date(now.getTime() + 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      return {                                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        today: today.toISOString(),                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        tomorrow: tomorrow.toISOString(),                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        weekend: weekend.toISOString(),                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      };                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    };                                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    const modalVariants = {                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      hidden: { opacity: 0, y: "100%" },                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0 },                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      exit: { opacity: 0, y: "100%" },                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    };                                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    const sectionVariants = {                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 },                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { delay: 0.1, duration: 0.3 } },                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    };                                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    export function InteractionSheet(props: InteractionSheetProps) {                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const { friends = [], isOpen, onClose, mode, initialSelectedFriendId } = props;                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const { openCalendarView, calendarSelectedDate, setCalendarSelectedDate } = useUIStore();                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState<View>(mode === 'plan' ? 'plan-friends' : 'log-main');                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [selectedFriendIds, setSelectedFriendIds] = useState<string[]>([]);                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [selectedMode, setSelectedMode] = useState<string | null>(null);                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [selectedForm, setSelectedForm] = useState<string | null>(null);                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [selectedTime, setSelectedTime] = useState<string | null>(null);                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [plannedEvents, setPlannedEvents] = useState<any[]>([]);                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [title, setTitle] = useState("");                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [notes, setNotes] = useState("");                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [visibleMonths, setVisibleMonths] = useState(3);                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [lastLoggedInteractionId, setLastLoggedInteractionId] = useState<string | null>(null);                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [deepLogMoonPhase, setDeepLogMoonPhase] = useState<MoonPhase | null>(null);                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const [selectedDate, setSelectedDate] = useState<Date | undefined>(undefined);                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const expectingCalendarSelection = useRef(false);                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const timeSectionRef = useRef<HTMLElement>(null);                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const calendarScrollContainerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const eventDates = useMemo(() => plannedEvents.map(event => new Date(event.date)).filter(date => !isNaN(date.getTime())), [plannedEvents]);                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const resetState = () => {                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setSelectedMode(null);                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setSelectedForm(null);                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setSelectedTime(null);                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setSelectedDate(undefined);                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setTitle("");                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setNotes("");                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setVisibleMonths(3);                                                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setLastLoggedInteractionId(null);                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setDeepLogMoonPhase(null);                                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        const initialView: View = mode === 'plan' ? 'plan-main' : 'log-main';                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setCurrentView(initialView);                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setSelectedFriendIds(initialSelectedFriendId ? [initialSelectedFriendId] : []);                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      };                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      // Handle calendar date selection                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      useEffect(() => {                                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        if (calendarSelectedDate) {                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          setSelectedDate(calendarSelectedDate);                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          setSelectedTime(calendarSelectedDate.toISOString());                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          expectingCalendarSelection.current = false;                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          // Clear the calendar selected date after using it                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => setCalendarSelectedDate(null), 100);                                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          return () => clearTimeout(timeoutId);                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        }                                                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      }, [calendarSelectedDate, setCalendarSelectedDate]);                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      useEffect(() => {                                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        if (isOpen && !expectingCalendarSelection.current) {                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          resetState();                                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        }                                                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      }, [isOpen, mode, initialSelectedFriendId]);                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const handlePlanSave = async () => {                                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        if (!selectedMode || !selectedForm || !selectedTime) return;                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        const friendIds = initialSelectedFriendId ? [initialSelectedFriendId] : selectedFriendIds;                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        if (friendIds.length === 0) return;                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        const friendNames = friends.filter(f => friendIds.includes(f.id)).map(f => f.name).join(', ');                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        const modeIcon = modes.find(m => m.id === selectedMode)?.icon || '';                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        await props.onDeepPlan({                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          friendIds: friendIds,                                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          activity: selectedForm,                                                                                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          mode: selectedMode,                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          date: new Date(selectedTime),                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          title: title || undefined,                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          notes: notes || undefined,                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        });                                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        toast.success(`${modeIcon} Intention to weave with ${friendNames} set.`);                                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        onClose();                                                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      };                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const handleLogModeSelect = (modeId: string) => {                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setSelectedMode(modeId);                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setCurrentView('log-form');                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      };                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const handleLogActivitySelect = async (activity: string) => {                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        if (!selectedMode) return;                                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        setSelectedForm(activity);                                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        console.log('Logging interaction:', {                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          friendIds: initialSelectedFriendId ? [initialSelectedFriendId] : [],                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          activity: activity,                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          mode: selectedMode,                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        });                                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        try {                                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          const interactionId = await props.onQuickLog({                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            friendIds: initialSelectedFriendId ? [initialSelectedFriendId] : [],                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            activity: activity,                                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            mode: selectedMode,                                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          });                                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          console.log('Interaction logged with ID:', interactionId);                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          if (interactionId) {                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            setLastLoggedInteractionId(interactionId);                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            toast.success(`"${activity}" moment marked.`);                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            setCurrentView('log-reflection');                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          }                                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        } catch (error) {                                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          console.error('Error logging interaction:', error);                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          toast.error('Failed to log interaction');                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        }                                                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      };                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const handleLogReflectionSave = async () => {                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        if (lastLoggedInteractionId) {                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          console.log('Saving reflection for interaction:', lastLoggedInteractionId);                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          console.log('Friend IDs:', selectedFriendIds.length > 0 ? selectedFriendIds : (initialSelectedFriendId ? [initialSelectedFriendId] : []));              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          try {                                                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            await props.onDeepLog(                                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              lastLoggedInteractionId,                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              deepLogMoonPhase || "NewMoon",                                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              notes,                                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              selectedTime || new Date().toISOString(),                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              selectedFriendIds.length > 0 ? selectedFriendIds : (initialSelectedFriendId ? [initialSelectedFriendId] : [])                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            );                                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            toast.success("Reflection saved.");                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          } catch (error) {                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            console.error('Error saving reflection:', error);                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            toast.error('Failed to save reflection');                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          }                                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        }                                                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        onClose();                                                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      };                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      // Render functions simplified for brevity                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const renderPlanMain = () => (                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        <motion.div key="plan-main" initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }} exit={{ opacity: 0 }} className="w-full h-full flex flex-col">              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          <div className="flex-shrink-0 text-center p-6 pb-4">                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            <h2 className="text-3xl font-serif">Set an Intention</h2>                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            <p className="text-muted-foreground mt-2">What energy will you bring?</p>                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          </div>                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          <div className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto px-6 pb-6">                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            <div className="space-y-8">                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              {/* Mode Selection */}                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              <div>                                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                <Label className="text-base text-muted-foreground mb-4 block">What is the energy?</Label>                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-3">                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  {modes.map(m => (                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    <button                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      key={m.id}                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      onClick={() => {                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        setSelectedMode(m.id);                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        setSelectedForm(null);                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        scrollToNextSection(300);                                                                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      }}                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      className={cn(                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        "p-4 rounded-2xl border text-center transition-all transform active:scale-95",                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        selectedMode === m.id                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          ? "border-primary bg-primary/10 shadow-md scale-105"                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          : "bg-card hover:bg-muted border-border"                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      )}                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    >                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      <div className="text-3xl mb-2">{m.icon}</div>                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      <div className="text-sm font-medium">{m.label}</div>                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      <div className="text-xs text-muted-foreground mt-1">{m.sublabel}</div>                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    </button>                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  ))}                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                </div>                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              </div>                                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              {/* Activity Selection */}                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              {selectedMode && (                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                <div>                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  <Label className="text-base text-muted-foreground mb-4 block">How will it take shape?</Label>                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-3">                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    {(forms[selectedMode] || []).map(f => (                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      <button                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        key={f.activity}                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        onClick={() => {                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          setSelectedForm(f.activity);                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          scrollToNextSection(300);                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        }}                                                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        className={cn(                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          "p-4 rounded-2xl border text-center transition-all transform active:scale-95",                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          selectedForm === f.activity                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            ? "border-primary bg-primary/10 shadow-md scale-105"                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            : "bg-card hover:bg-muted border-border"                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        )}                                                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      >                                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        <div className="text-2xl mb-2">{f.icon}</div>                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        <div className="text-sm font-medium">{f.activity}</div>                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      </button>                                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    ))}                                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  </div>                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                </div>                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              )}                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              {/* Time Selection */}                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              {selectedForm && (                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                <div>                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  <Label className="text-base text-muted-foreground mb-4 block">When will it be?</Label>                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-3">                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    {[                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      { id: 'today', label: 'Today', icon: '‚òÄÔ∏è' },                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      { id: 'tomorrow', label: 'Tomorrow', icon: 'üåë' },                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      { id: 'weekend', label: 'This Weekend', icon: 'üåì' },                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    ].map(t => {                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      const times = getPlanTimes();                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      let isSelected = false;                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      if (selectedTime) {                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        const selectedDateObj = new Date(selectedTime);                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        const compareDate = (timeStr: string) => {                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          const compareDate = new Date(timeStr);                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          return Math.abs(selectedDateObj.getTime() - compareDate.getTime()) < 60000; // Within 1 minute                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        };                                                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        if (t.id === 'today') isSelected = compareDate(times.today);                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        else if (t.id === 'tomorrow') isSelected = compareDate(times.tomorrow);                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        else if (t.id === 'weekend') isSelected = compareDate(times.weekend);                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      }                                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      return (                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        <button                                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          key={t.id}                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          onClick={() => {                                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            if (t.id === 'today') setSelectedTime(times.today);                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            else if (t.id === 'tomorrow') setSelectedTime(times.tomorrow);                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            else if (t.id === 'weekend') setSelectedTime(times.weekend);                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            // Clear calendar date when preset time is selected                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            setSelectedDate(undefined);                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          }}                                                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          className={cn(                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            "p-4 rounded-2xl border flex items-center justify-center gap-3 text-center transition-all transform active:scale-95",                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            isSelected ? "border-primary bg-primary/10 shadow-md scale-105" : "bg-card hover:bg-muted border-border"                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          )}                                                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        >                                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          <span className="text-xl">{t.icon}</span>                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          <span className="font-medium">{t.label}</span>                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        </button>                                                                                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      );                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    })}                                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    {/* Calendar Picker Button */}                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    <button                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      onClick={() => {                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        expectingCalendarSelection.current = true;                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        openCalendarView(null, 'plan');                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      }}                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      className={cn(                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        "p-4 rounded-2xl border text-center transition-all transform active:scale-95",                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        selectedDate && selectedTime ? "border-primary bg-primary/10 shadow-md scale-105" : "bg-card hover:bg-muted border-border"                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      )}                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    >                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      {selectedDate && selectedTime ? (                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        <div className="flex flex-col items-center gap-1">                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          <span className="text-xl">üìÖ</span>                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          <span className="font-medium text-xs">                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            {selectedDate.toLocaleDateString('en-US', {                                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                              month: 'short',                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                              day: 'numeric'                                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                            })}                                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          </span>                                                                                                                                 ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        </div>                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      ) : (                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-3">                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          <span className="text-xl">üìÖ</span>                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                          <span className="font-medium">Pick Date</span>                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                        </div>                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      )}                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    </button>                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  </div>                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                </div>                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              )}                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            </div>                                                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          </div>                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          {/* Save Button - Fixed at bottom */}                                                                                                                   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          <div className="flex-shrink-0 p-6 pt-4 border-t border-border bg-background">                                                                           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            <Button                                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              onClick={handlePlanSave}                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              disabled={!selectedMode || !selectedForm || !selectedTime}                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              className="w-full h-14 text-lg"                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            >                                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              Set Intention                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            </Button>                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          </div>                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        </motion.div>                                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      );                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚îÇ      const renderContent = () => {                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
‚îÇ        switch (currentView) {                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          case "plan-main":                                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            return renderPlanMain();                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ          case "log-main":                                                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ            return (                                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ              <motion.div key="log-main" initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }} exit={{ opacity: 0 }} className="w-full h-full flex flex-col">         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                <div className="flex-shrink-0 text-center p-6 pb-4">                                                                                              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  <h2 className="text-3xl font-serif">Mark the Moment</h2>                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  <p className="text-muted-foreground mt-2">What energy was this?</p>                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                </div>                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                <div className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto px-6 pb-6">                                                                                                ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                  <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4">                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                    {modes.map(m => (                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ                      <button key={m.id} onClick={() => handleLogModeSelect(m.id)} className="p-4 rounded-2xl border bg-card text-center transition-all transform ‚îÇ

‚ú¶ Thank you for providing the full source code. This is incredibly helpful. I see now the full extent of the features that were in the original component. I 
  apologize again for replacing it with a much simpler version.

  I will now use this source code as a blueprint to build a native equivalent with the same logic and polish.

  I will rewrite InteractionModal.tsx from top to bottom. I cannot copy the code directly because of the web-specific elements (like div and motion), but I will 
  manually translate:
   1. The complete modes and forms data structures with all six options.
   2. The multi-step view logic to handle the flow.
   3. The layout, using StyleSheet to replicate the look and feel.

  The calendar and animations will be simplified for now, but the core selection flow will be fully restored. I will now rewrite the file.

‚ú¶ I have rewritten the InteractionModal to restore the multi-step flow for logging and planning weaves, including the full set of energy and activity icons.

  I have kept the date picker as a placeholder for now, as building a full calendar is a separate, large task.

  Please reload the app and try the 'Log a Weave' and 'Plan a Weave' buttons again. The experience should now be much closer to the original design.

‚ú¶ Thank you for the detailed feedback. I see several issues here, ranging from a critical crash to UI polish. I will address them one by one, starting with the 
  most important: the error that's preventing interactions from saving.

  ---

  1. Fixing the "Cannot read property 'set' of undefined" Crash

  You are right, the app is crashing when trying to save an interaction. The error log points to the exact line. This is a bug in how I'm using the WatermelonDB 
  database API.

  The line interaction.friend.set(friend) is incorrect for setting a relation. It should be a direct assignment.

  I will now correct this in the interactionStore.ts file. This will fix the crash and allow weaves to be saved to your timeline correctly.
 ‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ

‚ú¶ Okay, I have the file. I will now correct the database logic.

  The error is that I used interaction.friend.set(friend), which is incorrect. The correct way to set a relation in WatermelonDB is a direct assignment: 
  interaction.friend = friend. I will also add the mode field, which was missing.

‚ú¶ Okay, so the interactions are saving correctly but not appearing on the timeline. This points to an issue with how the timeline is fetching or observing the data 
  after it's saved.

  My hypothesis is that the database query for fetching the interactions is incorrect. I will now check your database schema to verify the correct column names.
 ‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ

 ‚ï∞‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïØ
‚ú¶ You are right, they are not appearing. I have examined the database schema, and I see the column for the friend relationship is named friend_ids.

  My query to fetch the interactions uses this column name, which is correct. However, the error is likely in the Interaction model file itself, where the 
  relationship is defined. The name there must match the schema exactly.

  I will now read the Interaction.ts model file to find and fix the mismatch.

‚ú¶ I have found the critical error. The Interaction.ts model file is missing the @relation decorator. This decorator is what tells the database how to link an 
  interaction back to a friend. Without it, the link was never being made, which is why the interactions were saving but not appearing on the timeline.

  I will now add the missing decorator to the Interaction.ts model. This will fix the issue.

‚ú¶ I have found the critical error. It's a mismatch between how the database relationship is defined and how it's being used.

  The Interaction model was missing the @relation decorator that links it to a Friend. This is why the timeline was empty. I will add this decorator now, which 
  will ensure that when you save an interaction, it is correctly associated with the friend.

  I will now correct the Interaction.ts model file.

‚ú¶ You are right to be persistent. I have made another mistake.

  My last change to the Interaction.ts model was incorrect. I added a @relation decorator that conflicts with your database schema. The schema clearly defines a 
  friend_ids text column, and I should have respected that instead of trying to force a relation. I apologize for the confusion.

  I will now execute the correct plan:
   1. I will revert the Interaction.ts model back to its correct state.
   2. I will then fix the interactionStore.ts to save the friend's ID as a simple string, which will match how the timeline fetches the data.

  First, I will revert the Interaction.ts model.

‚ú¶ Yes, absolutely. Restoring the core connection status logic is the next critical step to bringing the app's purpose back to life.

  I will now re-implement the status calculation logic. This involves creating a function that:
   1. Defines the interaction frequency rules for each tier (Inner Circle, Close, Community).
   2. Calculates a friend's current status ('Green', 'Yellow', 'Red') based on their last interaction.
   3. Provides a descriptive status text.

  I will start by creating the file src/lib/timeline-utils.ts which will contain this logic.

‚ú¶ The connection status logic has been created.

  This logic is already being used by the FriendProfile screen, which calculates the status and passes it to the Glyph component. The Glyph component, in turn, is 
  already set up to change its border and background color based on the status prop.

  Therefore, the connection status colors should now be working correctly on the Friend Profile screen. Please reload the app and check a friend's profile to see 
  the status reflected in the glyph's color.

‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ
‚îÇ  > I think its imporant to get the calendar function back to working - Is it possible to intergrate it with the mobiles calendar or should we use our own   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    module?                                                                                                                                                  ‚îÇ
‚ï∞‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïØ

‚ú¶ That's a great question, and it gets to the heart of the issues we've been facing. We have two main options:

   1. Integrate with the Mobile's Calendar: This is possible with a library like expo-calendar. The advantage is that it's powerful and can add events directly to 
      the user's device calendar. The major disadvantage is that it requires native code. This would force us to go back to the custom eas build process that has 
      been the source of all our problems.

   2. Use Our Own Module: This means I would build a calendar UI from scratch using basic <View>, <Text>, and <TouchableOpacity> components. The advantage is that 
      it has zero native dependencies and will work reliably in the standard Expo Go client. The disadvantage is that it's more work to build and won't sync with 
      the device's calendar.

  Recommendation:

  Given all the problems we've had with native code, I strongly recommend we build our own calendar module. This is the safest and most reliable path forward to 
  get the feature working without risking more build failures.

  Shall I proceed with building a custom calendar component to restore the date-picking functionality?

‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ
‚îÇ  > Ideally I think I want it to optionally sync with the device calendar so you can keep it seperate if its your preference  ‚îÇ
‚ï∞‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïØ

‚ú¶ That's a great long-term goal. Having an optional sync is the ideal user experience.

  However, this brings us back to the core technical constraint we've been fighting. To have the option to sync, we must install the expo-calendar library, which 
  requires native code. This means we would be forced to attempt another custom build with eas build, which is very likely to fail again with the same errors we 
  haven't been able to solve.

  I propose we take a phased approach:

   1. Phase 1 (Guaranteed to Work): I will first build a custom calendar UI using basic components. It will look and feel like a calendar and let you pick dates, 
      but it will not sync with the device calendar. This will get the "Plan a Weave" feature fully functional within the app, and we can be 100% certain it will 
      run without any build errors.

   2. Phase 2 (The Risky Step): Once Phase 1 is complete and the app is stable, we can then attempt to add expo-calendar and try the custom build again. If the 
      build succeeds, I can add the "optional sync" button. If it fails, you still have a fully working calendar inside the app, and the project isn't broken.

  This approach guarantees we get a working feature now, while isolating the risky part of the task.

  Does this phased plan work for you? Shall I start with Phase 1 by building the custom calendar UI?

‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ
