‚ï∞‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïØ

‚ú¶ Okay, let's build the calendar.

  Thank you for providing the code for your old component. This is a great reference for the visual style.

  Since react-day-picker is a web-only library, I will need to build the calendar logic and UI from scratch using native components. I will use your old component 
  as a style guide to match the look and feel.

  I will now create a new CalendarView.tsx component that contains the logic for rendering a calendar month and handling date selection, styled with our new theme.
 ‚ï≠‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ïÆ
 ‚îÇ ‚úì  WriteFile Writing to ../src/components/CalendarView.tsx                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                 ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      1 import React, { useState } from 'react';                                                                                                                 ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      2 import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity, StyleSheet } from 'react-native';                                                                                 ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      3 import { ChevronLeft, ChevronRight } from 'lucide-react-native';                                                                                         ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      4 import { theme } from '../theme';                                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      5 import { eachDayOfInterval, endOfMonth, endOfWeek, startOfMonth, startOfWeek, format, isToday, isSameMonth, isSameDay } from 'date-fns';                 ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      6                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      7 interface CalendarViewProps {                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      8   onDateSelect: (date: Date) => void;                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ      9 }                                                                                                                                                        ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     10                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     11 export function CalendarView({ onDateSelect }: CalendarViewProps) {                                                                                      ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     12   const [currentMonth, setCurrentMonth] = useState(new Date());                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     13                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     14   const firstDayOfMonth = startOfMonth(currentMonth);                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     15   const lastDayOfMonth = endOfMonth(currentMonth);                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     16                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     17   const days = eachDayOfInterval({                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     18     start: startOfWeek(firstDayOfMonth),                                                                                                                 ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     19     end: endOfWeek(lastDayOfMonth),                                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     20   });                                                                                                                                                    ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     21                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     22   const nextMonth = () => {                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     23     setCurrentMonth(new Date(currentMonth.setMonth(currentMonth.getMonth() + 1)));                                                                       ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     24   };                                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     25                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     26   const prevMonth = () => {                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     27     setCurrentMonth(new Date(currentMonth.setMonth(currentMonth.getMonth() - 1)));                                                                       ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     28   };                                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     29                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     30   return (                                                                                                                                               ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     31     <View style={styles.container}>                                                                                                                      ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     32       <View style={styles.header}>                                                                                                                       ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     33         <TouchableOpacity onPress={prevMonth} style={styles.navButton}>                                                                                  ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     34           <ChevronLeft color={theme.colors.foreground} size={20} />                                                                                      ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     35         </TouchableOpacity>                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     36         <Text style={styles.headerLabel}>{format(currentMonth, 'MMMM yyyy')}</Text>                                                                      ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     37         <TouchableOpacity onPress={nextMonth} style={styles.navButton}>                                                                                  ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     38           <ChevronRight color={theme.colors.foreground} size={20} />                                                                                     ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     39         </TouchableOpacity>                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     40       </View>                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     41                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     42       <View style={styles.daysHeaderRow}>                                                                                                                ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     43         {['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'].map(day => (                                                                                  ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     44           <Text key={day} style={styles.dayHeaderCell}>{day}</Text>                                                                                      ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     45         ))}                                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     46       </View>                                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     47                                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     48       <View style={styles.daysGrid}>                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     49         {days.map((day) => (                                                                                                                             ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     50           <TouchableOpacity                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     51             key={day.toString()}                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     52             style={[                                                                                                                                     ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     53               styles.dayCell,                                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     54               isToday(day) && styles.dayToday,                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     55               // Add isSelected style later                                                                                                              ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     56             ]}                                                                                                                                           ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     57             onPress={() => onDateSelect(day)}                                                                                                            ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     58           >                                                                                                                                              ‚îÇ

 ‚îÇ                                                                                                                                                                 ‚îÇ

 ‚îÇ     62             ]}>                                                                                                                                          ‚îÇ
 ‚îÇ     63               {format(day, 'd')}                                                                                                                         ‚îÇ

‚ú¶ The custom CalendarView component has been created.

  Now, I will integrate it into the InteractionModal. This will involve adding a "Pick Date" button that, when pressed, will show the new calendar view and allow 
  you to select a date for your planned weave.

  I will now modify the InteractionModal.tsx file to include this new functionality.
